message:
Dear Geeks interested in Software/Solutions Software architecture 

I created a group for Solutions Architects here https://www.yammer.com/microsofttechnicalcommunities/groups/solutionarchitects/info
name: Yammer
caption: www.yammer.com
description: Yammer is a tool for making companies and organizations more productive through the exchange of short frequent answers to one simple question: What are you working on?
